data.name: Arcade Paradise Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Soundtrack worthy of the cassette collection!

From the individual games to choosing what song to put on the jukebox inspired by some of the great records of the early 90s, the Arcade Paradise soundtrack captures the heart of a bygone era.
data.about_the_game:

From the individual games to choosing what song to put on the jukebox inspired by some of the great records of the early 90s, the Arcade Paradise soundtrack captures the heart of a bygone era.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 461 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 845 MB available space
